name: Spire - The Demo
description:
This is a demo for a game that I hope to fully develop in the future. Spire is about Kenai, an islander who seeks to restore a magical river that ran dry, leaving her village vulnerable. Follow along with Kenai as she discovers the true source of the river, and has to face her own inner demons. 

-- All assets, art, music and code were created by me, no external assets were used--

Build notes: PLEASE READ!

There are a handful of known issues. Please leave a comment if a bug is uncovered. 

Known issues:

- Second room is cut off on the right side of the room

-Collision-based instances may take a few seconds to load

-Black end screen is missing text 

- Certain bits of text flicker

- Some collision is off

-Object interaction text will overlap unless you click space again to get rid of the text before interacting with another object
